item.description:
Kayak Quaboag River from Rt. 148 boat launch (in Brookfield) to Quaboag Pond and back.

Sunday September 30 - Meet at 11:00am at boat ramp across the street from White's Landing.

***ON-SITE RENTALS AVAILABLE from White's Landing - see their website to call for reservations http://www.whitesland... - they request that you call ahead for reservations as much ahead of time as possible

This trip is suitable for beginners, as it is a still river. Approximate trip time is 2 to 3 hours, comfort/skill level of group will determine how far we paddle - if everyone is up for a longer paddle we can paddle across the pond (it's big), if not, we'll turn around when we get to the pond.

To get there -

From Rt. 9 to Rt. 148 South - It's 0.6 miles from Rt. 9 to the boat launch, which will be on the left, just before the river.

From Rt. 20 to Rt. 148 North - It's 6.9 miles from Rt. 20 to the boat launch, which will be on the right just after driving over the river.
item.name: Kayak Quaboag River - ON SITE RENTALS available
